As a result, DUAB is required to appoint an emergency manager to oversee the turnaround and termination of all business procedures. As emergency manager, Gary Schools Recovery will have all the powers, authority and responsibilities of both the superintendent and the school board to manage the day-to-day operations of GSCC.",
    "Justification of Vendor Selection and Price Reasonableness": "Gary Schools Recovery, LLC has served as an emergency manager for GSCC since 2017. They have made significant progress in addressing the financial situations that triggered distressed status. Continuing with Gary Schools Recovery as the emergency manager enables DUAB and GSCC to build on this progress and to use the data and know-how while facing the financial state of GCSC without interruption. Gary Schools Recovery has agreed to keep its cost constant this price for the third year of its prior contract, which was the lowest annual amount. DUAB and Gary Schools Recovery negotiated with a portion of the cost be an incentive that should be paid as savings realized materialize. Therefore DUAB recommended to be performed benchmarks.",
